_desc 02: Explicit values set below will overwrite param file values during promo deployment
_desc 03: 1. Parameters found in this file will be selected exclusively for ACCP promotions
_desc 04: 2. Both ARM Template Parameter Values And Global Parameters can be defined for replacement
_desc 05: 3. To request an override, set the parameter key and replacement value as a string
_desc 06: 4. Keys starting with an underscore will be ignored during conversion
_desc 07: 5. Precedence is awarded to the target env file when a parameter is set in many files
_example: this string would replace the '_example' parameter value if underscores weren't ignored
